author: Janelle Griffith
title: Georgia governor's decision to reopen state draws mixed reactions from business owners
description: "The fact that he said it's OK to open doesn't mean that the virus transmission is different or that less people will die," one business owner said.
content:
The reaction among Georgia business owners and public officials to Gov. Brian Kemp's decision to reopen some businesses amid the coronavirus pandemic has been decidedly mixed.
Some business owners welcomed the opportunity to reopen their doors, grateful to b… [+7293 chars]
